title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith™
notes: In-game performance is smooth and no issues, however menus only appear in corner of the screen while mouse input is stretched across the entire screen

title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith™
notes: Single player works identically to Windows. Multiplayer does not work: the DirectPlay protocol list is garbled, and none of the options work for either hosting or connecting to games.
Issues with fullscreen for the menu but works with 4k in game. Played through first mission without issues noticed.
title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight - Mysteries of the Sith™

notes: In-game it's ok; but like it's been said already, the menu only appear in corner of the screen while mouse input is as if the menu were fullscreen.
title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight - Mysteries of the Sith™

notes: Same as other testers - menu is in window top left of screen while mouse area covers almost entire screen, meaning you have to click as if the window were full screen for the commands to react. This is fiddly but can be overcome with patience. Game itself renders in fullscreen and works as well as Windows.
title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight - Mysteries of the Sith™
